JobApplnSearchableField.name: JobApplnSearchableField
JobApplnSearchableField.description: Represents searchable data for job applications, enabling criteria-based search and filtering to find applications that match the user-specific criteria.

AccountId.description: The ID of the job applicant's account.

ApplicantEmail.description: The email address of the job applicant.

ApplicantExperience.description: The total work experience of the job applicant.

ApplicantName.description: The name of the job applicant.

ApplicantQualification.description: A list of qualifications held by the job applicant.

ApplicationFormId.description: The application form associated with the job application.

ApplicationFormName.description: The name of the application form associated with the job application.

ApplicationFormStage.description: The stage in the approval process of the application form associated with the job application.

AppliedDate.description: The date when the job application was submitted.

CandidateSourceKey.description: The unique key of the recruitment portal where the job application was submitted.

EmploymentOfferStatus.description: The status of the employment offer associated with the job application.

Geolocation.description: The geolocation of the applied job position.

GeolocationLatitude.description: The latitude of the applied job position's geolocation.

GeolocationLongitude.description: The longitude of the the applied job position's geolocation.

JobPositionId.description: The job position associated with the job application.

JobPositionName.description: The name of the job position associated with the job application.

LastEvaluationDecision.description: The decision of the latest application form evaluation associated with the job application.

LastEvaluationId.description: The latest application form evaluation associated with the job application.

LastEvaluationName.description: The name of the latest application form evaluation associated with the job application.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LocationId.description: The ID of location associated with the applied job position.

LocationName.description: The name of the applied job position's location.

Name.description: The name of the job application searchable field record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the job application searchable field record owner.

RecruitmentPostingId.description: The recruitment posting associated with the job application.

RecruitmentPostingName.description: The name of the recruitment posting associated with the job application.

RecruitmentRequisitionId.description: The recruitment requisition associated with the job application.

RequisitionIdentifier.description: The name of the recruitment requisition associated with the job application.
